      • getValueOfAttrNamedInNodeIndexNamedEnclosedInNodeInDoc

        public static String getValueOfAttrNamedInNodeIndexNamedEnclosedInNodeInDoc(String attributeName,
                                                            int nodeIndex,
                                                            String nodeName,
                                                            String enclosingNodeName,
                                                            Document doc)
        get the value of a specific attribute with an enclosing node. Example: The PHMR contains a deeply nested observation node like this The following test will pass: assertEquals( "L", getValueOfAttrNamedInNodeIndexNamedEnclosedInNodeInDoc( "unit", 1, "value", "observation", phmrDoc) );
        Parameters:
        attributeName - name of the attribute whose value is returned
        nodeIndex - the number of the node named 'nodeName' in the child list of node 'enclosingNodeName'
        nodeName - name of the node with the attribute
        enclosingNodeName - name of the node that encloses the node
        doc - the XML document
        Returns:
        the value of the attribute or null if not found.
